string.name: features
string.b: This is an app for user to keep track of the product and their warranty expiry date. Users may view the things they desire using this program, and there are also associated websites where users may check on their own. This program also includes a product list with expiration dates. Users may add new goods, alter expiration dates, and delete goods on their own.

resources.string: You do not have any product to remove!
